channel.title: CVE Feed for HUAWEI -- HUAWEI P30
channel.description: The latest CVEs for HUAWEI -- HUAWEI P30

item.title: CVE-2020-1812|2024-08-04T06:46:30.908Z -- huawei -- huawei%20p30
item.description: HUAWEI P30 smartphones with versions earlier than 10.0.0.173(C00E73R1P11) have an improper authentication vulnerability. Due to improperly validation of certain application, an attacker should trick the user into installing a malicious application to exploit this vulnerability. Successful exploit could allow the attacker to bypass the authentication to perform unauthorized operations.

item.title: CVE-2020-1798|2024-08-04T06:46:30.922Z -- huawei -- huawei%20p30
item.description: HUAWEI P30 smartphones with versions earlier than 10.1.0.135(C00E135R2P11) have an improper authentication vulnerability. A logic error occurs when handling NFC work, an attacker should establish a NFC connection to the target phone, and then do a series of operations on the target phone. Successful exploit could allow a guest user do certain operation which is beyond the guest user's privilege.
